definitions.definition: used to refer to a person or thing that is different or distinct from one already mentioned or known about.
examples: stick the camera on a tripod or some other means of support
the other side of the page

definitions.definition: those remaining in a group; those not already mentioned.
examples: they took the other three away in an ambulance

definitions.definition: that which is distinct from, different from, or opposite to something or oneself.
view or treat (a person or group of people) as intrinsically different from and alien to oneself.
examples: a critique of the ways in which the elderly are othered by society
